data.feedback: Great work on completing Phase 1! The implementation summary looks thorough and covers all the requirements. The security measures are well-noted. Approved for moving to the next phase.

Excellent work on Phase 2! The enhancements to the editor, execution analytics, sharing, and sample scripts are exactly what was envisioned. The detailed summary and technical implementation notes are very helpful. Approved!

Outstanding work on Phase 3! The real-time syntax analysis, error underlining, and performance optimizations are significant improvements. The detailed technical implementation and verification steps are excellent. Approved!
Excellent work on Phase 4! The implementation of RESTful endpoints, webhook support, and preparation for obfuscator integration completes the API design as required. Approved!
